Container.Name: dashy
Container.Overview: <p>Dashy helps you organize your self-hosted services, by making them all accessible from a single place.</p> <p>-<span style="color: rgb(184, 49, 47);">Before you start CLI unraid</span><br><br><em>mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/dashy/</em><br><em>wget -O /mnt/user/appdata/<em>dashy</em>/conf.yml <a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lissy93/dashy/master/public/conf.yml">https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lissy93/dashy/master/public/conf.yml</a></em><br><br>-Edit <em>conf.yml</em> </p>
Container.Description: <p>Dashy helps you organize your self-hosted services, by making them all accessible from a single place.</p> <p>-<span style="color: rgb(184, 49, 47);">Before you start CLI unraid</span><br><br><em>mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/dashy/</em><br><em>wget -O /mnt/user/appdata/<em>dashy</em>/conf.yml <a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lissy93/dashy/master/public/conf.yml">https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lissy93/dashy/master/public/conf.yml</a></em><br><br>-Edit <em>conf.yml</em> </p>
